official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to require that individuals who are elderly and who live in certain types of group living arrangements be treated as individual households.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to deem as individual households any persons 60 years of age or older or recipients of disability benefits under the Social Security Act who reside in certain kinds of group living arrangements.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to require that individuals who are elderly and who live in certain types of group living arrangements be treated as individual households.
